metadata.title: CVE-2024-49934 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:fs/inode: Prevent dump_mapping() accessing invalid dentry.d_name.nameIt's observed that a crash occurs during hot-remove a memory device,in which user is accessing the hugetlb.
